src:
Previše oscilacija i nervoze: Zvezda potonula u četvrtoj četvrtini
07 Nov 2019, 21:03 by Zile
Crvena zvezda – Real Madrid 60:75 (9:12, 18:21, 25:16, 8:26)
Košarkaši Crvene zvezde doživeli su peti poraz u novoj sezoni Evrolige. Bez Dejana Davidovca i Filipa Čovića i uz mnogo oscilacija u igri crveno-beli nisu mogli da iznenade „kraljevski klub“ koji je došao do četvrtog trijumfa.
Vrlo nervozno prvo poluvreme odigrali su Zvezda i „kraljevski klub“, a to se pogotovo odnosi na prvu četvrtinu. Skoro punih 6 minuta crveno-beli su imali samo 2 postignuta poena, ali se na drugoj strani nije proslavio ni Real, koji je u tom periodu stekao prednost od 7:2.
U tim trenucima jedini raspoloženi igrači Zvezde bili su Gist i Lorenco Braun koji su sa sedam vezanih poena doneli jedino vođstvo Zvezde u prvom poluvremenu. Ipak, finiš četvrtine pripao je Realu koji je pogodio samo jednu trojku iz 10 pokušaja u prvih 10 minuta, a sa 5 uzastopnih poena dobio je prvu četvrtinu sa 12:9. U drugoj četvrtini igrači su malo opustili ruku, a „kraljevski klub“ je od prvog do poslednjeg trenutka druge četvrtine kontrolisao stvari na parketu.
Imali su gosti i dvocifrenu prednost (22:12), Bili Beron je trojkom 6 sekundi pre kraja uspeo da približi Zvezdu na 31:27, ali je Serhio Ljulj uz zvuk sirene postigao koš za vođstvo od 33:27 posle prvih 20 minuta. O dešavanju na parketu u prvom poluvremenu dovoljno govori statistika – Zvezda je pogodila 10 od 25 šuteva iz igre, dok je Real šutirao 13/35.
Zvezda je odigrala fantastičnu treću četvrtinu, serijom od 8:0 od 24. do 27. minuta prvi put nakon prve četvrtine stigla je do izjednačenja, a trojkom Muhameda Fajea 24 sekunde pre isteka 30. minuta stekla prednost 52:49. Međutim u odlučujućih 10 minuta dogodio se veliki pad u igri Zvezde, punih 5 minuta njeni igrači nisu poentirali, a za to vreme Real je pogodio 4 trojke i sa 12:0 uveo meč u mirniji tok. U četvrtoj četvrtini Zvezda je postigla samo jedan koš iz igre, pa je Real na kraju ostvario ubedljivu pobedu.
Kod Zvezde Beron je bio najefikasniji sa 17 poena, Lorenco Braun je ubacio 14, a kod Reala Lulj 16, Rudi Fernandez 12, a Tavareš 11 poena.
Posle ovog meča Zvezda ima skor 2-5, dok je Real svoj odnos pobeda i poraza popravio na 4-3.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Too much oscillation and nervousness: The star sank in the fourth quarter
07 Nov 2019, 21:03 by Zile
Red Star - Real Madrid 60:75 (9:12, 18:21, 25:16, 8:26)
The Red Star basketball players suffered their fifth defeat in the new Euroleague season. Without Dejan Davidovac and Filip Covic, and with a lot of oscillations in the game, the Red and White could not have been surprised by the "royal club" which reached the fourth triumph.
A very nervous first half was played by the Star and the Royal Club, and this is especially true for the first quarter. For almost the full 6 minutes, the Red and White had only 2 points, but on the other hand, neither did Real, who gained a 7-2 lead in that period.
In those moments, the only available players of the Star were Gist and Lorenzo Brown, who with seven tied points brought the only lead of the Star in the first half. Still, the quarter-finals went to Real, who hit just one threesome out of 10 tries in the first 10 minutes, and with 5 consecutive points he got the first quarter with 12-9. In the second quarter the players relaxed their hand a little, and the Royal Club controlled things on the floor from the first to the last second of the second quarter.
The guests had a double-digit advantage (22:12), Billy Beron managed to bring the Star to 31:27 with 6 seconds left, but Serhio Ljulj scored a 33:27 lead after the first 20 minutes. What happens on the floor in the first half is enough statistics - the star hit 10 of 25 shots from the game, while Real shot 13/35.
The star played a fantastic third quarter, a series of 8-0 from the 24th to the 27th minute for the first time after the first quarter, it came to equalization, with Muhammad Faye's threesome 24 seconds ahead of the 30th minute gaining a 52:49 lead. However, in the decisive 10 minutes there was a big fall in the game of the Star, the full 5 minutes its players did not score, and during that time Real hit 4 threes and with 12: 0 brought the match into a more peaceful course. In the fourth quarter, the Star scored only one basket from the game, so Real eventually won a convincing victory.
At Star Beron was the most efficient with 17 points, Lorenzo Brown scored 14, with Real Loul 16, Rudi Fernandez 12 and Tavares 11 points.
After this match, Zvezda have a score of 2-5, while Real has improved their win-loss ratio to 4-3.
